title: Chinese Beef and Tomato Stir Fry
ingredients: ['Marinade', '1/2 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon light soy sauce or 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '1-2 tablespoons cornflour, mixed with 1 tablespoon water', '450g beef steak, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon oil', '2 tablespoons chopped garlic', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 onion, sliced', '1 shallots, diced', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2-3 tomatoes, diced', 'Sauce', '2 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '4 tablespoons tomato puree', 'water, as needed', 'salt to taste', 'sugar to taste']
